Review_Text: The film reflects the real mood of today's events. Shows the cohesion of Europe at a time of real threat. Offended Russians put bad marks, and the film is chic and makes you think.

Many things to think about here...how a no-account like Hunter Biden sucking up to some oligarch ends up changing the world, Trump's refusal to help Ukraine because of his re-election ambitions (Zelenskyy not having anything to say about Hunter Biden), Zelenskyy's own charisma, Putin's decisions - it's a lot to think about for such a short documentary. I don't understand why other reviewers rated this so low- was it because they've been Nirvana-ed? ("Entertain us!)" This is important stuff!

SpoilerThere are no real facts about Nazism. Documentary? And where are any documents, sources, references? The level of a school movie. Discovery fell in moss eyes. You are not ashamed to take off a political offense. Shame!
Ukraine did not lose not because of, but in spite of Zelensky. The hero is not Zelensky. Hero Ukrainian people, army, volunteers and western countries.
